text: The Holy Spirit is the greatest reality in the world.

text: I am not moved by what I see. I am not moved by what I feel. I am moved only by what I believe.

text: If your faith says yes, God cannot say no.

text: God has given us two hands, one to receive with and the other to give with.

text: When you work, you work. But when you pray, God works.

text: The greatest power that God has given to any individual is the power of prayer.

author: Kathryn Kuhlman
text: Faith touches God; love touches God.

text: I surrendered unto Him all there was of me; everything! Then for the first time I realized what it meant to have real power.

text: God is not looking for golden vessels, and does not ask for silver vessels, but He must have clean vessels.

author: Kathryn Kuhlman
text: It is not your prayers, it is not your tears, it is not your fasting, it is faith.

author: Kathryn Kuhlman
text: The Holy Spirit is a gentleman. He does not enter where He is not welcome.

author: Kathryn Kuhlman
text: You can have everything He has. It is yours for the asking.

author: Kathryn Kuhlman
text: Beloved, you can't give what you haven't got.

author: Kathryn Kuhlman
text: No one can give you what you have not got.

author: Kathryn Kuhlman
text: When Jesus died on the cross, He said, 'It is finished.' He meant it.

author: Kathryn Kuhlman
text: I believe in miracles because I believe in God.

text: Whether I live or die, I am the Lord's.

text: The presence of Jesus is the most real thing I know.

text: Faith is that quality or power by which the things desired become the things possessed.

author: Kathryn Kuhlman
text: Without Him, I can do nothing.

text: Great faith is the product of great fights.

text: I am not moved by what I see. I am not moved by what I feel. I am moved only by what I believe.

text: Faith is an act.

author: Smith Wigglesworth
text: There is nothing impossible with God.

author: Smith Wigglesworth
text: The Bible is the Word of God: supernatural in origin, eternal in duration, inexpressible in value, infinite in scope, regenerative in power, infallible in authority, universal in interest, personal in application, inspired in totality.

author: Smith Wigglesworth
text: Politeness involves the art of listening.

author: Smith Wigglesworth
text: If you leave God out of your reckoning, you will fail.

author: Smith Wigglesworth
text: Fear looks; faith jumps.

author: Smith Wigglesworth
text: To hunger and thirst after righteousness is when nothing in the world can fascinate us so much as being near God.

text: God does not call those who are equipped, He equips those who are called.

text: The secret of spiritual success is a hunger that persists.

author: Smith Wigglesworth
text: Only believe.

text: The power of God is greater than any power of the enemy.

author: Smith Wigglesworth
text: Dare to believe God.

text: Live in God, and you will live in the miraculous.

text: If your faith says yes, God will not say no.

text: Faith does not look at the problem; faith looks at the promise.

text: Life is too short to be small.

text: My home is in Heaven. I'm just traveling through this world.

text: God loves you. He wants you to succeed. He wants the best for you.

text: Courage is contagious. When a brave man takes a stand, the spines of others are often stiffened.

text: A daily minute of prayer is better than an hour of sleep.

text: Mountaintops are for views and inspiration, but fruit is grown in the valleys.

author: Billy Graham
text: Prayer is the Christian's greatest weapon.

author: Billy Graham
text: God proved His love on the Cross.

author: Billy Graham
text: We are the Bibles the world is reading; we are the creeds the world is needing; we are the sermons the world is heeding.

text: Comfort and prosperity have never enriched the world as much as adversity has.

author: Billy Graham
text: The greatest form of praise is the sound of consecrated feet seeking out the lost and helpless.
